title: Los Viajes de Guillermo
description: Gulliver’s Travels meets Honey, I Shrunk the Kids. Guillermo and his travel companion Hector must find a way to return to normal size and put their faith in the scientist they both love.
quote: Neither of us will have the lady scientist if we stay small.
starring: Rogelio De La Vega, Esteban Santiago, Fabian Regalo del Cielo
altHero: Guillermo looks concerned while talking to Hector
alt1: a tiny man riding an ant
alt2: two tiny men next to a giant comb on a dresser
alt3: tiny Hector next to the comb’s teeth
alt4: tiny Guillermo amongst science lab equipment
